titleStmt.title: A modest and true account of the chief points in controversie between the Roman Catholics and the Protestants together with some considerations upon the sermons of a divine of the Church of England / by N.C.
titleStmt.author: Nary, Cornelius, 1660-1738.
Colson, Nicholas.

notesStmt.note: "Probably by Cornelius Nary, but also attributed to Nicholas Colson"--BM.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
